code:
```
[BEGIN]
module TopModule (
    input logic clk,
    input logic w,
    input logic R,
    input logic E,
    input logic L,
    output logic Q
);

    always @(posedge clk) begin
        if (R) begin
            Q <= 1'b0; // Reset Q to 0
        end else if (L) begin
            Q <= E ? w : Q; // Load value from w if E is asserted
        end
    end

endmodule
[DONE]
```
